title: Apricot and Soy Chicken
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into 2cm (1 in) strips', '280ml (10 fl oz) chicken stock', '255g (9 oz) apricot conserve or jam', '1 tablespoon reduced salt soy sauce', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon water']
